definition.text: Notice how you changed the Angle to Parent setting on different siblings and each of them reacted to the new setting independently from the rest!

paragraphs.text: You control the position of each node from within the node's menu. Not the parent node nor the siblings may affect the position... save for this cool exception:
Go to the Lightning Strike Backtesting Session and select Add Missing Children from the right-hand side of the menu!
Notice how the Social Bots node inherited the Angle to Parent setting from its closest sibling!
